review_data.title: What a night!
review_data.content: We ended up having 2 cocktails, then went to dinner elsewhere. Instead of getting drinks with dinner we came straight back here. Such a chill environment, and the bartending staff are just gorgeous. Would highly recommend for a chill cocktail before/after dinner

review_data.title: Nicer Abend
review_data.content: War ein toller Abend. Barkeeper sind sehr freundlich und nett. Der Drink war sehr lecker und schnell zubereitet. Preis stimmt...More

review_data.title: Start your tour of old town here
review_data.content: Good staff and attention to detail. Recommend stopping in on your tour of old town. Enjoy a cocktail and conversation.

review_data.title: Best cocktails of the city
review_data.content: Best cocktails of the city ! I worked as barman too , they work with passion and that result with the best cocktails of the city :)

review_data.title: Leckere Cocktails, coole Location

review_data.title: Really nice place!

review_data.title: Excellent Cocktails
review_data.content: We came in late afternoon for a few cocktails. There was an extensive selection and the drinks were excellent

review_data.title: Tolle Bar für einen gemütlichen Drink

review_data.title: Lieblings Bar in Zürich
review_data.content: Super Cocktails zu (für Zürich) günstigeren Preisen. Tolles Ambiente und nettes Personal. Komme immer wieder gerne.

review_data.title: Great Bar
review_data.content: We dropped in for a drink and will definitely go back on our next visit to the city. It had a great relaxed atmosphere. A stylish place with interesting history. Service was great.

review_data.title: Coole Bar mitten in der Stadt

review_data.title: On s'y sent tellement bien
review_data.content: Deux fois en deux semaines. Pas pour l'assiette charcuterie/fromage qui est poussive mais pour l'ambiance si intime de ce lieu....More

review_data.title: Really good
review_data.content: If you want to have a drink and relax it's a great place! The service was good and the prices for zurich are really good

review_data.title: Sehr gut

review_data.title: Angenehmes Ambiente.
review_data.content: Als es zu regnen begann sind wir spontan in die BarMünster gegangen. Ganz viele andere machten zeitgleich dasselbe. Deshalb dauerte...More

review_data.title: Delicious cocktails!
review_data.content: Cool bar to go if you live in old city. But be careful, really crowded Friday and Saturday nights. Oh, highly recommends Rosemary Fizz))

review_data.title: 覺得不錯的酒吧～

review_data.title: Poor service due to overcrowding
review_data.content: Spotted this bar while strolling the old town, their board outside the entrance listed Piscosour which attracted my friend and we decided to get in. The drink took forever to come probably because their limited number of staff was busy attending the overwhelmingly in pour...More

review_data.title: Ein Favorit in Zürich
review_data.content: In der BarMünster gibt's die besten Drinks bei lockerem Ambiente und freundlicher Bedienung. Ein echter Geheimtipp inmitten des Niederdorfs!

review_data.title: Classy little place
review_data.content: We found this place while strolling down the back streets of Zurich. They had good wine (dry red) and my boyfriend had a Jameson Irish Whiskey. Classy atmosphere, dark with nice furnishings and good music low enough so that you could carry on a conversation....More

review_data.title: Very cool!
review_data.content: Very friendly service, with a lot of drinking options, but sadly not a lot for eating. We had to eat the same thing twice.

review_data.title: Münster Bar: gepanscht statt gerührt
review_data.content: Die BarMünster ist eine sympathisches, etwas düsteres Lokal am ehemaligen Casa Bar-Standort im Niederdorf. Seit Beginn war ich gelegentlich Gast...More

review_data.title: Just one word: amazing
review_data.content: We will definitely recommend to anyone to have a little stop (or big) at this bar. The staff is really friendly, helpful and attentive. We had the best mojito and Negroni. It’s small but never felt crowded. Thank you

review_data.title: Best (only) bar in Old Town (right of Limmat)
review_data.content: Great atmosphere, nice selection of cocktails. Come on a Saturday and be seated with Laurenz (A+ guy/waiter)

review_data.title: Very cool spot
review_data.content: Needed refreshment and spotted this place. Really friendly staff greeted us as soon as we walked in. Great cocktails, good vibe, and a really nice place to watch the world go by in the old town.

review_data.title: Sehr coole Bar!
review_data.content: Kamen hier an einem Samstagabend auf Drinks vorbei. Die Atmosphäre im Barmünster war sehr gut, es herrschte fröhliche & ausgelassene...More

review_data.title: Must visit if you like mixed drinks
review_data.content: My wife and I stopped in to Barmunster after a long day trekking around Zurich. The staff was friendly and the drinks were great. I had a stiff old fashioned and she has a Moscow mule. They don't have a full kitchen but they do...More

review_data.title: Perfect...relax,refresh, renew
review_data.content: Great for a cocktail after jaunting about in Zurich. MY cocktail delish.. (Mojito),there are pages of choices. The beer selection made my taste loving husband swoon ...his choice(Kona Firerock).....the antipasto tray gorgeous and tasty. Highly recommend.

review_data.title: super !
review_data.content: cocktails avec ou sans alcool impeccables ! whiskies single malt très intéressants, ainsi qu'une très belle carte offrant beaucoup de...More

review_data.title: First time & loved the atmosphere, unique!
review_data.content: ...Lovely bar, perfect furniture, great background music & really relaxin'. Nice service & a great selection of drinks/cocktails 😃 a must visit when close by!

review_data.title: Wonderful charming bar!
review_data.content: We wandered into the Bar Munster while shopping. Wonderful cocktails and wine with a charming atmosphere and beautiful French music. review_data.title: Très agréable
review_data.content: Ce n'est pas un restau mais un bar qui propose de jolis plats à déguster en buvant un verre, style...More

review_data.title: Excellent cocktails
review_data.content: A friend and I decided to try BarMunster when the place next door, Cabaret Voltaire, was particularly dead - and what a great find! The drinks are of some of the best I've had in Zurich, and the vibe was comfortable and relaxed, but still...More

review_data.title: Afternoon drinks in Old Zurich
review_data.content: Great little bar to stop at when walking through "old Zurich" near Gross-Munster. Friendly staff, Great drinks, delicious Antipasti Platters

review_data.title: Great cocktails, best tartare, friendly service :)
review_data.content: Great atmosphere, laid back music, brilliant cocktails! Very friendly service- highly recommend :) the tartare was a revelation!

review_data.title: Nice cocktails for decent price
review_data.content: If you want to drink good cocktails in Zürich for a reasonable price there are two options, one of which is BarMunster. The advantages of this place are it's friendly staff, great location and all round comfortable atmosphere. The only downside is lack of outside...More

review_data.title: Best bar in Zurich
review_data.content: This was our favorite bar in Zurich and personally my favorite bar anywhere. We were only in town for a few days and randomly stumbled upon this place mid-afternoon while walking through the city. We sat looking out a large open window on a warm...More

review_data.title: Excellent cocktails!
review_data.content: My friends and I had the best time! Cocktails were excellent as well as the atmosphere! Lovely place!! Thank you for an excellent experience!

review_data.title: Ex Casa-Bar, einfach eine gute Bar
review_data.content: Das Lokal ist hell und freundlich. Die Einrichtung erinnert nicht mehr an die früheren Zeiten. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich...More

review_data.title: Great find
review_data.content: We stopped by for a post-dinner drink Saturday evening. The bar was cozy w/ great touches - good drinks, attentive staff, chill music, convenient location, and great glassware. Loved the attention to detail - friendly service and awesome espresso martini!

review_data.title: Really nice place
review_data.content: Had a salad and a drink... environment is very nice and cosy, nice music and very friendly staff. Perfect for a chilled apero or a chat with friends. Will come again for sure :)

review_data.title: No pretentiousness, just a good bar!
review_data.content: Came across this, walking past it. Good service, good cocktails and seemingly good prices within a very expensive place that is Zurich. Worth a visit.

review_data.title: First time and definitely come again!
review_data.content: We serendipitously walked into this Bar and were pleasantly surprised by the attentive and friendly staff, especially also with children. They quickly served us some Pretzels and the drinks menu, including the drinks once ordered. Everything was impeccable, we felt not just welcome but nicely...More

review_data.title: Good cocktails in town
review_data.content: My friend and I are used to come to this Place it is simply because we enjoy their good cocktails and nice music. They have a good service the staffs are friendly. If you are searching for a good cocktail and nice ambience? I would...More

review_data.title: Lovely atmosphere and cocktails
review_data.content: They offer very good cocktails at reasonable prices. The atmosphere and the music (kind of jazz) are very pleasant.

review_data.title: Great Spot to People Watch in the Old Town
review_data.content: Visited this bar twice during our stay in Zurich. Staff were most friendly and helpful. Night time is very busy with a great buzz. Good drinks menu with prices better than average. Nice to sit at the window in the afternoon and people watch.

review_data.title: Great Steak Tartar - Great Service!
review_data.content: This bar at prime location does offer great a great steak tartar and a very good caesars salad for a very fair price. The service is great and the bar does offer a wide and great range of cocktails! Great place to go!

review_data.title: Tolle Bar - Klasse Cocktails - Supernettes Personal
review_data.content: Ausgezeichnete Atmosphäre und eine grosse Auswahl an Drinks. Bartenders waren mega freundlich und haben schnell und speditiv gearbeitet. Werde definitiv...More

review_data.title: Super place to chill out
review_data.content: Great place, we came half past midnight for a snack . Tartar and tapas plate turned out to be absolutely delicious. right music to chill out, very friendly and considerate services

review_data.title: Friendly owner and bar in Niederdorf
review_data.content: BarMunster is located in the Niederdorf and the owner was very nice and spoke English and German during my visit. The bar was taking photos and videos while I was there to update their website. They have a few sidewalk tables on the cobblestone walkway...More

review_data.title: Oldschool Bar
review_data.content: Hier gibt es eine grosse Cocktail Auswahl, deren Zubereitung auch ausgezeichnet war. Die Einrichtung und auch die Musik passt zur...More

review_data.title: Nice and cosy bar - lot of cocktails
review_data.content: We got there by "accident". Actually we were looking to eat out but all restaurants were packed at the time. We decided to go for a drink and found the BarMünster to be inviting. We decided to have a cesar salad and an apero plate....More

review_data.title: Nette Bar mit gutem Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis
review_data.content: Ein sehr nett und gemütlich eingerichtetes Lokal mit dem eindeutigen Schwerpunkt auf die Koktails. Bar-Keeper spart nicht an Alkohol, was...More

review_data.title: Great cocktails
review_data.content: The ginger snap is fantastic. Great friendly bartenders. Ask from Danny. Unique cocktails make it a must stop. Classy music not too loud.

review_data.title: Cool old-school atmosphere and music
review_data.content: Really enjoyed a late drink there with a friend on a Saturday evening. They put a lot of effort into making good cocktails. Furthermore, what I liked the most was the old-school music which gave this bar a cool character! Definitely recommend this one!

review_data.title: Excellent drinks in Old Town
review_data.content: First time visit to Zurich. Walking through the Old Town, stopped in for drinks at the bar. review_data.title: Heimelige Bar - Endlich im Niederdorf

review_data.title: Wer nicht zu laute Musik mag.........
review_data.content: Sehr angenehme Bar in der man sich endlich unterhalten kann. Super Drinks, sehr günstig für Zürich. Extrem freundliche Bedienung! Nur...More

review_data.title: Nette Bar mit Nachgeschmack
